title: Create Supabase migrations for schema and seed data
description: Create initial Supabase migration for all tables, indexes, and triggers. Create separate seed data migration with 50 starter prompts. Test rollback functionality. Ensure migrations are idempotent and reversible.

title: Browser automation for OAuth flows
description: Use browser control to handle Google OAuth instead of manual user steps. User shouldn't have to fight Google's UI.

title: Ninja Content Pipeline
description: Automated YouTube/social video creation with Veo 3.1 + ElevenLabs + Nano Banana Pro
close_reason: Pipeline complete - automated YouTube Shorts with Kling Avatar lip-sync, ElevenLabs TTS, Nano Banana thumbnails

title: YouTube OAuth browser setup
description: Need user to complete OAuth flow in browser for YouTube API

title: Integrate B-roll into main pipeline
description: B-roll generator works standalone, integrate with --broll flag
close_reason: Completed 2026-01-29. B-roll works with --broll. Topic extraction uses LLM now.

title: Instagram automation
description:
Instagram Graph API setup for automated Reel posting.

Guide: docs/instagram-api-setup.md

Steps:
1. Switch IG to Creator/Business account (5 min)
2. Create Facebook Page + link IG (5 min)  
3. Create Meta Developer App + permissions (30 min)
4. Generate tokens + get IG User ID (15 min)
5. Test API post (10 min)
6. Build instagram_upload.py script

Video specs match our YouTube Shorts - no changes needed.
Token refresh: every 60 days (can automate).

title: Implement PostgreSQL full-text search with GIN indexes
description: Create search_prompts() SQL function with tsvector + GIN index. Support weighted ranking (title > description > template). Create trigger to auto-update search_vector. Create Supabase RPC endpoint. Target: <100ms search performance.

title: CLI Arena Milestone 3: Gemini adapter, three-way dashboard, path fixes
close_reason: All 6 steps complete: GeminiParser, GeminiAdapter, three-way dashboard with radar chart, path fixes, integration tests, README update. 118 tests passing, 0 failures.

title: Local B-roll generation with RTX 4090
description: Use Stable Video Diffusion or CogVideoX on local 4090 instead of Veo API for B-roll. Free + faster iteration.

title: Create 50 high-quality seed prompts across 5 categories
description: Write 50 production-ready prompts: Marketing (10), Code (10), Writing (10), Research (10), Personal (10). Each must have: title, description, template with variables, skill level, AI model compatibility. Add Prompt DNA annotations to 10 featured prompts. Token count: 200-500 per prompt.

title: Optimize database with pagination and connection pooling
description: Add pagination support (20 per page), configure Supabase connection pooler, optimize queries with EXPLAIN ANALYZE, implement caching strategy (5-min TTL). Verify all queries use indexes, no N+1 patterns. Target: <50ms query performance.

title: Real Multi-LLM Council — Perplexity Integration + Live API Calls
close_reason: All steps implemented and verified: core lib, CLI, shadow council --real mode, cron env fix

title: Move home directory projects and caches to /srv (1.8TB drive)
description: Move remaining large directories from ~/home to /srv (1.8TB SATA). Prior work (Feb 7) already migrated 51GB (caches, toolchains, 8 projects). Remaining: delete .cache-old (15GB), migrate .local (3.2GB), .claude (2.5GB), .clawdbot (281MB), go/ (39MB). Pattern: rsync to /srv/home/{cache,projects,toolchains}/, symlink back. Design doc: docs/plans/2026-02-09-srv-migration-design.md
close_reason: Migration complete. Deleted .cache-old (15GB), migrated .local (3.2GB), .claude (2.5GB), .clawdbot (281MB), go/ (39MB) to /srv. 20 symlinks verified, all toolchains passing. NVMe freed 20GB (173→153GB used).

title: Build automated RLS test suite with Vitest
description: Create comprehensive test suite that verifies RLS policies prevent data leakage. Tests: User A cannot read User B's private data, cannot modify others' data, public data is accessible. Target: 100% RLS policy coverage, all tests pass in <10s.

title: Implement Row-Level Security policies for all tables
description: Enable RLS on all user-owned tables (collections, user_customizations, prompt_usage, prompt_ratings). Create policies: users can only access their own private data, public data is readable by all. Ensure users cannot read/modify other users' data.

title: Deploy database to Supabase production with monitoring
description: Apply migrations to production, load seed data, verify 50 prompts accessible. Configure query performance monitoring, set alerts for slow queries (>500ms). Run RLS test suite against production. Verify no public access to private data.

title: Create end-to-end integration tests for database operations
description: Build integration test suite: create user → collection → add prompts, search → paginate, user customization flow, rate prompts. Test RLS in real scenarios. Performance tests with 500 prompts. All tests must pass, search <100ms.

title: Design database schema with versioning and attribution
description: Design complete database schema for Prompt Toolkit including users, prompts, collections, ratings, versions. Must support versioning (parent_id, version), attribution (author_id), and future marketplace. Include ERD diagram, indexes, and full-text search infrastructure (tsvector + GIN).
close_reason: Complete database schema design with ERD, indexes, triggers, and comprehensive documentation. Schema supports versioning, attribution, marketplace, and full-text search (<100ms target). Includes 10 tables, 30+ indexes, 3 triggers, 2 functions, 2 views, and complete DATABASE.md guide.

title: Document database schema and performance benchmarks
description: Create DATABASE.md with complete schema documentation (all tables, fields, indexes, RLS policies). Export ERD diagram. Document Supabase RPC functions with examples. Record performance benchmarks (search, pagination, RLS overhead).
